title: Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
description: When retrieving datetime values from a table, they are displayed in different formats in the dynamic text item and the data/text item.
OB: When viewing the datetime values in the dynamic text item and the data/text item, the format is different.
EB: The datetime values should be displayed in the same format in both the dynamic text item and the data/text item.
SR:
1. Input new Date() as the content for three items. 
2. Save and preview the page. 

Expected result: The datetime values should be displayed in the same format in both the dynamic text item and the data/text item. 
Actual result: The datetime values are displayed differently in the dynamic text item and the data/text item.
